gurmukhi: jau n rhau ssurwr kiRsodr jwih ipqw giH qoih pTY idau ]
transliteration: Jau Na Rahau Sasuraar Krisodar Jaah(i) Pitaa Grih Toh(i) Padhhai Dio||

gurmukhi: nYk sy Bwnn qy hm k`au joeI Twt kho soeI gwT igTY idau ]
transliteration: Naik Se Bhaanan Te Ham Kau Joithaat Kaho Soigadth Githai Dio||

gurmukhi: jy ikCu cwh kro Dn kI tuk moh kho sB qoih auTY idau ]
transliteration: Je Kichh(u) Chaah Daro Dhan Kitouk Moh Kaho Sabh Toh(i) Outhai Dio||

gurmukhi: kyqk AauD ko rwj slocn rMk ko lMk insMk lutY idau ]247]
transliteration: Ketak Audh Ko Raaj Salochanndrank Ko Lank Nisank Loutai Dio||247||

gurmukhi: Gor sIAw bn qUM su kumwr kho hmsoN ks qY inbhY hY ]
transliteration: Ghor Seeaa Ban Toun Su Koumaar Kaho Hamson Kas Tai Nih-hai Hai||

gurmukhi: guMjq isMG fkwrq kol BXwnk BIl lKY BRm AYhY ]

gurmukhi: suMkq swp bkwrq bwG Bkwrq BUq mhw duK pYhY ]
transliteration: Sounkal Saap Bakaarat Baagh Bhakaarat Bhoot Mahaa Doukh Padhhai||

gurmukhi: qUM su kumwr rcI krqwr ibcwr cly quih ikauN bin AYhY ]248]
transliteration: Toon Su Koumaar Rachikartaar Bichaar Chale Tuh(i) Kioun Ban(i) Aihai||248||

gurmukhi: sUl shoN qn sUk rhoN pr sI n khoN isr sUl shoNgI ]
transliteration: Sool Sahon Tan Sook Rahon Par Sina Kahon Seer Sool Sahon-gee||

gurmukhi: bwG bukwr PnIn Pukwr su sIs igro pr sI n khoNgI ]

gurmukhi: bws khw bnbws Blo nhI pws qjo pIX pwie ghoNgI ]
